I wish I could come in here and press a giant undo button, but unfortunately I cannot.  Whenever you disenchant or upgrade a shard, you are presented with a confirmation screen to double-check you are making the right call.  Since you had to have gone through the confirmation screen as well, we can't undo the disenchant :(
I mean you could just give me the skin and take away the points like its not that hard. Or is adobe air the problem
By the way there was no confirmation screen because the client is broken i click disenchant and it was gone

We have tested this on multiple different accounts and computers, and a confirmation screen does appear every single time.  Without the unique pressing of this button, your shard will not be disenchanted, even if the client "bugs" out.  It needs the command to take the action.

Once again, I wish I could give a better answer and help further on this, but we can't undo the disenchant :(
Once you've used a Hextech Shard, unfortunately there's no way to reverse it. I'm sorry :/
